tool.name: Naive Bayes Testing

param.name: dataset
param.label: Dataset
param.help: The names of one or more datasets, in which the algorithm will be executed.

param.name: pathology
param.label: Pathology
param.help: The name of the pathology in which the dataset belongs to.

param.name: x
param.label: X
param.help: Independent variables: A list of variables from the database.

param.name: y
param.label: Y
param.help: Dependent variable: A categorical variable from the database.
